page.title: 16KEEPING PIGEON'S.
page.content: My hobby is keeping pigeons.Pigeons are birds,I keep them in our shed in the back garden.I let them out every morning and shut them up and them at night.They eat Belgium mixed corn that costs Â£4.00 for a big sack.That lasts about 1 month at the most.You need sand and gravel.I have 7 pigeons and and 5 cages.2 pigeons are paired so they live in the same cage.The only job I dont like doing is cleaning them out,I hate that job so I let my dad do it or anybody but me. I breed them.My dad's frend has got 40 pigeons and 36 baby chicks.To get them in you just rattle a tin with corn in or they just come in when they are hungry if you feed them in the morning they don't come back. BY DAVID PRICE AGE 11
